library(rvest)

## R scrape

```{r scrape}

site <- html("https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/country/us/")

site %>% html_nodes("td:nth-child(3) , td:nth-child(2) , td:nth-child(5) , .sorting_desc+ .sorting , td:nth-child(6) , .sorting:nth-child(6) , td:nth-child(4) , .sorting:nth-child(4) , .sorting_desc , td:nth-child(1) , .sorting:nth-child(1)") %>% html_text() -> siteDataRaw

```
